eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mono, CA; AT 01:05 PM ON NOV 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:05 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A wildfire is threatening the Crowley Lake community. Evacuate now. An evacuation order has been issued by the Mono County Sheriffs Department for the Crowley Lake community. A temporary evacuation center is being established in Mammoth Lakes Middle School.
